quote: Jorge went above and beyond helping us find our dream home. He was available at all times to help us.
author: K. Slo

quote: Excellent realtor throughout a stressful process—knowledgeable with a wide network. Guided and reassured us from beginning to end.
author: Sam Pobanz

quote: Out-of-state sale for my mother—Jorge gave her the extra care and attention she needed. Highly recommend!
author: Franco Marini

quote: We had a great experience—he found us our forever home and we love it.
author: Beth Sharp

quote: Extremely helpful and attentive through the entire purchasing process. I never felt pressured.
author: Olga Sherman

quote: Pleasure to work with—calm demeanor helped us through a hectic closing and he worked hard to get the best offer possible.
author: Cristina De La Rosa

quote: After a bad experience elsewhere, Jorge sold my house within a week and $20k over asking!
author: Ivo Trinajstic

quote: Honesty, patience, integrity, and top-tier professionalism—Jorge is the best of the best.
author: Matt Eisenberg
